attributes.action: To introduce a law that recognizes Parental Alienation as a criminal offence.
attributes.additional_details: This should be recognized for the crime that it is. Child Abuse and an abuse of Human rights. Children deserve the right to both parents and parents have the right to be parents. Please do whats in the best interests of the children. Not the alienating parent. Give the judges the power to act against parental alienation by simply making it a criminal offence.
attributes.background: To introduce a law that recognizes Parental Alienation as a criminal offence. Every year thousands of children will be brainwashed against the other parent with lies.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599005
